      • initScopeField

        private void initScopeField​(FieldInfo fieldInfo,
                            java.util.Set<FieldInfo> scopeFieldSet,
                            java.util.Set<MethodInfo> scopeMethodSet,
                            java.util.List<FieldInfo> interruptList)
        Put all methods that accessing the target field into the same scope. Recursively for all methods.
        Parameters:
        fieldInfo - The target field.
        scopeFieldSet - Add all fields that exists in the same scope to this set.
        scopeMethodSet - Add all methods that related to the input param fieldInfo object to this set.
        interruptList - Avoid cycle dependency.

      • initMethodPassingAccessToField

        private void initMethodPassingAccessToField​(ClassInfo classInfo)
        Start from fields, scan the dependencies upward, to get the direct connections set
        Parameters:
        classInfo - the current ClassInfo object

      • initMethodPassingAccessToField

        private void initMethodPassingAccessToField​(FieldInfo targetField,
                                            MethodInfo currentMethod,
                                            java.util.List<MethodInfo> interruptList)
        Find all methods that accessing the same fields through the invocation tree. Add the result to the metadata variable that declared in FieldInfo object.
        Parameters:
        targetField - current instant variable
        currentMethod - the method that access to the targetField
        interruptList - A list to avoid recursion or dependency circle that leading to infinite loops

      • initDirectCallingConnection

        private void initDirectCallingConnection​(MethodInfo methodInfo)
        Complement the metadata that required by LCOM4 metric: Methods and fields are invoked by which local methods.
